mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDINFO2 ( BOARDSEQ, ID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, HITCOUNT, INDATE, FILENAME, FILENAME_ORG ) VALUES ( BOARDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, 0, sysdate, #{fileName}, #{fileName_org} )
mapper.select:
SELECT BOARDSEQ, ID, BOARDTITLE, HITCOUNT, INDATE FROM BOARDINFO2
WHERE BOARDTITLE LIKE '%'||#{_parameter}||'%'
ORDER BY INDATE DESC
SELECT BOARDSEQ, ID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, HITCOUNT, INDATE, FILENAME, FILENAME_ORG FROM BOARDINFO2 WHERE BOARDSEQ=#{boardSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDINFO2 SET BOARDTITLE=#{boardTitle}, BOARDCONTENT=#{boardContent}, FILENAME=#{fileName}, FILENAME_ORG=#{fileName_org} WHERE BOARDSEQ=#{boardSeq}
UPDATE BOARDINFO2 SET HITCOUNT=HITCOUNT+1 WHERE BOARDSEQ=#{boardSeq}
mapper.select:
select count(BOARDSEQ) from BOARDINFO2
WHERE BOARDTITLE LIKE '%'||#{_parameter}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS ( COMMENTSEQ, BOARDSEQ, ID, COMMENTS, INDATE, PARENTSEQ ) VALUES ( COMMENTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardSeq}, #{id}, #{comments}, sysdate, #{parentSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, COMMENTS, INDATE, COMMENTSEQ, BOARDSEQ FROM COMMENTS WHERE BOARDSEQ=#{boardSeq} ORDER BY INDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET COMMENTS='(삭제된 댓글입니다.)' WHERE COMMENTSEQ=#{commentSeq}
